function ERU_EP05_03()
    -- .序章-3【1月第1週】「ボクが彼女にあげたモノ」
    SaveData.Title = "ボクが彼女にあげたモノ"

    -- ///BG：繁華街
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG004ae")
    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,800,0,30000,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000)
    -- //effect：セピア加工

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav",0)

    MSG([[ On the day of the great earthquake—I was visiting this busy shopping district together with "her." ]])

    MSG([[ It was a big adventure for a kid. We went around looking at various shops, bought the necklace I had my eye on, and gave it to "her" as a present. ]])

    MSG([[ Because that day was "her" birthday. I really wanted to give "her" something that would make her happy. ]])

    MSG([[ However, just after handing it over, a great earthquake struck— ]])

    PLAY_SE("SEd010.wav")
    EFFECT_SCREEN(1 , 30 , 30 , 1000,false,false)
    WAIT(300)

    -- //SE：ガラスの割れる音
    PLAY_SE("SEb050.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG004aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0167.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】
 "Mina-chan! Watch out!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1376.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Ah, Arto-oneechan—" ]])

    -- //SE：血の音
    PLAY_SE("SEb051.wav")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    LAYER_LOAD(10,"BG000ac")
    --LAYER_ALPHA(10,0)
    --LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(10,255,1000,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
--    WAIT(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(10,"")
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- ///BG：繁華街
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG004aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1377.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I remember everything." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I immediately called Akira and told her, "I want you to look for information about a person named Inoue Arto." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1131.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I-Inoue Arto? Who’s that guy with such a masculine name?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1132.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Isn’t the person we’re looking for someone named Armeria—" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1378.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Armeria was a false name. "Her" real name was Inoue Arto." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ That’s right, no one could have remembered the name Armeria. ]])

    MSG([[ Because that was the name I myself had given "her." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1379.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Think… think, think, think. If I were Armeria-san, and if I still had regrets, where would I leave a message...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Desperately digging through memories of "her," I considered places where Armeria-san might have left a message. ]])

    MSG([[ And then—I decided to head to the park where "her" and I had shared memories. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP05_04")
end
